placeholderTopic: e.g., "Organic Chemistry Class 12", "History of Ancient India", or "Python Programming Basics"
proTipContent: Be specific for better results. Try "Class 10 Math Quadratic Equations" instead of just "Math".

faqHeroBody: Everything you need to know about selftest.in
faqAWhatIs1: selftest.in is a lightweight, AI-powered quiz generator designed to help you learn faster. It creates multiple-choice tests on any topic you choose, allowing you to practice
faqAWhatIs2: â€”one of the most effective study techniques.
faqAIsFree: Yes. selftest.in is currently free to use. We may introduce premium features in the future for power users, but our core mission is to make learning accessible to everyone.
faqQStoreData: Do you store my personal data?
faqAStoreData: We minimize data collection. Your activity is cached locally for offline use and, when you sign in with Google, synced securely to your account so you can recover tests, bookmarks, and preferences across sessions. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
faqASaveQuizzes: Yes. Your quizzes are saved locally on your device for offline support. If you are signed in with Google, the same data is also synced to our database so you can restore it later. Without sign-in, clearing browser storage can remove your local history.
faqQAiGeneration: How does the AI generation work?
faqAAiGeneration: We use advanced language models to analyze your topic and generate relevant questions. Our system is guided to create clear stems, plausible distractors, and helpful explanations to keep the learning quality high.
contactHeroBody: Have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
contactInfoBody: Fill out the form or reach out to us directly. We try to respond within 24 hours.
messageSentBody: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you shortly.
configureAndGenerate: Configure your test and generate paper.
resumeOrCreate: Enter a Test ID to resume, or create a new test.
chooseModeToContinue: Choose your test mode to continue.
useBookmarksOrChooseMode: Use bookmarks for instant start or choose a mode.
newTestEntryDescription: Start with mode selection, then configure your paper.
tourStepWelcomeBody: Create AI-powered tests in seconds for Indian exams and topic practice in English or Hindi.
tourStepModeBody: Pick Full Exam for objective exam papers (SSC, Banking, Railways, Police, and more) or Quiz Practice for custom topic drills.
tourStepBookmarksBody: Bookmark exams and quiz presets for one-tap test creation on your next visit.
tourStepResultsBody: Submit the test to see results instantly, then generate detailed answer explanations only when you need them.
noBookmarkedExams: No bookmarked exams yet. Bookmark from Full Exam mode.
noBookmarkedQuizPresets: No bookmarked quiz presets yet. Save one in Quiz mode.
fullExamInstructionPlaceholder: Add custom instruction for this full exam paper
fullLengthSlowConnection: Full-length objective papers may take longer on slow connection.
offlineAccessHistory: You're offline. You can still access previously generated tests from history.
fullExamProTip: Tap bookmarked exam chips to instantly create full papers. Use browse list only when needed.
generationTimedOutRetry: Generation timed out after 180 seconds. Please retry.
errorFailedGenerateAfterAttempts: Failed to generate test after multiple attempts. Please try again later.

installAppPromptBody: Open shared test links directly in the app and continue even on weak internet.
installAppPromptIosBody: Use Safari Share and tap Add to Home Screen to install the app.
installAppPromptIosInAppBody: If this opened inside an in-app browser, open it in Safari first, then add it to Home Screen.
installGuideIosStep3: Tap Add to Home Screen, then Add.
installGuideIosInAppStep3: In Safari, tap Share and then Add to Home Screen.
installGuideAndroidStep2: Select Install app or Add to Home screen.
installGuideAndroidStep3: Confirm Install/Add and open from home screen.

achievement_speed_demon_description: Complete a quiz in under 60 seconds
aboutHeroBody: Your personal AI tutor. Learn faster and remember longer with custom quizzes and evidence-based study methods.
aboutMissionBody: We help learners practice actively through AI-generated quizzes and exam papers, using methods like Active Recall and Spaced Repetition.
aboutWhyWorksPoint1Body: Testing yourself strengthens memory better than passive review.
aboutWhyWorksPoint2Body: See what you know and what needs more practice immediately.
aboutWhyWorksPoint3Body: Generate tests exactly on the topics you need.
aboutStep1Body: Enter a topic, chapter, or exam syllabus area you want to master.
aboutStep2Body: Create a quiz or full exam paper in seconds.
aboutStep3Body: Attempt questions, review answers, and track your progress over time.
aboutBuiltBody: We continuously improve selftest.in to stay fast, practical, and student-first.
aboutValuePrivacyBody: Your learning data belongs to you. We keep collection minimal and transparent.
aboutValueSpeedBody: No complicated setup. Enter a topic and start learning.
aboutCtaBody: Create your first test in seconds. No password setup required.
privacyHeroBody: Transparency is key. Here is how we handle your data.
privacySection1Body: We collect only what is needed to run the service reliably and improve learning quality.
privacyItemHistoryBody: Stored locally for offline use. If you sign in, we also sync this data to your account for backup and cross-device recovery.
privacyItemContactBody: Optional. If you contact us, we collect your name and email to respond.
privacyItemAnalyticsBody: We use anonymized analytics to understand usage trends and improve performance.
privacySection2Body: Data is used to improve quiz quality, troubleshoot technical issues, and measure product reliability. We do not sell user data.
privacySection3Body: We may use cookies and third-party analytics for core functionality and product improvements. You can manage these in your browser settings where available.
privacySection4Body: You can clear local data from browser storage at any time. If signed in, synced records may remain tied to your account for history continuity.
privacySection5Body: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us anytime.
termsHeroBody: By using selftest.in, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
termsSectionUseBody: You must not use the service to generate or distribute illegal, abusive, or harmful content.
termsSectionLiabilityBody: The service is provided as-is. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
blogHeroBody: Tips, tricks, and techniques to help you learn smarter.
blogPost1Title: How to study effectively with Active Recall
blogPost1Excerpt: Evidence-backed study techniques: active recall, spaced repetition, and how to use selftest.in to improve retention.
blogPost2Title: Overcoming Exam Anxiety: A Practical Guide
blogPost2Excerpt: Simple strategies to manage stress and perform your best when it matters most.
blogPost3Title: Spaced Repetition: The Secret to Long-Term Memory
blogPost3Excerpt: Why cramming fails and how spacing out your review sessions can improve retention.
blogPost4Title: Best AI Prompts for Generating Study Quizzes
blogPost4Excerpt: How to craft better prompts to get relevant and challenging questions from selftest.in.
blogNewsletterBody: Get the latest study tips and product updates delivered straight to your inbox. No spam, ever.
